title: Australian fuel retail market under spotlight as ACCC reviews Ampol bid
full_text: Australian fuel retail market under spotlight as ACCC reviews Ampol bid. Australia’s competition watchdog has moved Ampol’s proposed acquisition of EG Australia into a Phase 2 review under the country’s new mandatory merger regime.... Australias fuel retail market is facing increased regulatory attention after the Australian Competition and Consumer Commission (ACCC) referred Ampol Limiteds proposed acquisition of EG Australia to … [+3662 chars]
